product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Fresh Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: I have dry skin that needs moisturizer  at all seasons.Even in summer,the AC dehydrates the skin so much that my dry skin is getting scaly with dryness like in winterüò≥ I needed a very good moisturizer coz my baby's Himalayan baby lotion is so light that it has no affect on my dry adult skin!So I ordered this as I vaguely remember using it once and liking it's fragrance.( I usually order Vaseline lotions for my mom whose fragrances I didn't like much).I received this and it's fragrance didn't disappoint. It's mild and lovely.As for it's moisturizing property,it's working nicely on my dry skin. My skin feels and looks lot better now. But the real litmus test will be in winter,when my very dry skin will tell how good this really is!The ingredients in this lotion includes Tapioca starch; the ingredient used in moisturizers that gives it's non greasy effect. So this lotion really does have a non greasy feeling.I bought this for a deal price of Rs.211. well worth it.Shelf life also very good,expiring in 2021.But I'm giving 4 stars as my initial impression was not good because I received a broken pump,I didn't find the broken part in the package which means it was packed broken and not a transit damage.

product_name: Vaseline Intensive Care Aloe Fresh Body Lotion, 400 ml
review: ¬†Vaseline is no longer the sticky moist oily cream of the past.It stands to the test of time.This aloe vera flavour is having pleasant mild aroma with sufficient moisturising capacity and smooth less oily appearance at the same time.Buying from Amazon specially in deal time is rewarding.I bought it @ 224/-.Packaging and delivery was standard.Do watch my unboxing video and pictures as well.Recommended purchase.Thank you.

review: Looking for a good moisturiser, This one is great!Intensive care deep restore is a really-really good moisturiser!- Good for both oily and dry skin.- Stays on for more than 24hours, better to use when skin is wet as moisturiser absorbs well and you don‚Äôt need much of the product and doesn‚Äôt feel greasy.- Leaves your skin moisturised, soft and supple.- Doesn‚Äôt even clog the pores and let your skin breath too.-Have a nice and mild smell.-Colour is whitish lemon.- I would really recommend it to those who would live to have a good body moisturiser for all seasons üòä- Is also available in small and big size too.- Time to time you get discounts for upto 10-15% or even more at times when there‚Äôs sale.- It‚Äôs a unisex product.

product_name: Biotique Bio Wheat Germ FIRMING FACE and BODY NIGHT CREAM For Normal To Dry Skin, 50G
review: I bought this for rs156 . And quite frankly I wasn't hoping for much because of the cost and my other failures with biotque and other skin products.I bought this in November , as it was getting very cold and my skin was becoming drier everyday and rough. So decided to use this night cream.I have oily to normal combination skin and prone to acne. So was skeptical about this product as not very many skin products suit me.So I'm writing this review after using the product for a good two months . I've used it almost every night.  It's really good. Like the formulation is very light and keeps the skin hydrated. And in the morning the skin feels extremely soft. You just need a small amount and even after using it for 2 months  almost everyday, more than half is remaining. I'm quite happy with the product. And I'll reuse it obviously. Also I just use to to avoid dryness of the skin and make my skin smother.

product_name: Biotique Bio Wheat Germ FIRMING FACE and BODY NIGHT CREAM For Normal To Dry Skin, 50G
review: Unlike other creams, Himalaya Bio Wheat Germ is a quick absorbing & heavy cream. It's best suitable for dry & extra dry skin type. It's meant to be used at night. Using at day time while going outside may make your face look oily. This cream has light nice aroma which is soothing.People having oily skin & acne issues - stay away from this.I'm have a extra dry skin. I use this combo in winter: Ponds lite cream at day and Himalaya wheat germ cream at night.

review: I have read many reviews of this product who say that they have received expired product. I want to clarify it. The date written on the FRONT SIDE CRIMP of the tube is not the expiry date but the MANUFACTURED DATE. The expiry date and batch number are written on the back side crimp of the tube. Please check properly before giving negative feedback as it can hamper the reputation of the seller.

review: Some time ago hai removing is most irreteting work for me. razor, wax is time wasting process. 1 time i tried veet hari remover cream. i just love it. product_name: Veet In-shower Hair Removal Cream, Normal Skin - 150 ml
review: I think it's a good new launch for all Veet lovers because it is easy for application while ur taking bath. 1st apply some cream in the skin, pink side sponge is to apply cream, then if u want u can start to take shower/bath in the next 1min, then in the next 3 or 4mins take the white side of the sponge given and rub it clock or anticlockwise to remove the cream along with hair until it vanishes. Total time for the cream should not exceed more than 5 or 6mins.Pros:Easy to use.It's also a cream to apply even while shower.Sponge technique is quite easy.Skin friendly.Cons:Though sponge is a easy one, the white sponge is really rough while removing the cream, so caution part is do not wipe sponge again & again in same spot.Have attached the pics in all directions since its a new launch.. Did the testing in a small portion in hand and attached the pic too, 1 pic is with hairs and the other is without, really it gives a very smooth skin than the usual Veet. Hair grows only after 6th day for me, depending upon the skin days differs... Got it for 450 but now it's reduced to 400. Good buy for a shower use than a razor üëçNote: This is not like the usual Veet, since it has sponge type, u should atleast pour some water in the cream before u remove them even if u didn't take shower since its basically made for shower use because it may be difficult for the skin if cream gets dry. Also white sponge is bit rough while using so don't rub lot in skin which may pain later.

product_name: Veet In-shower Hair Removal Cream, Normal Skin - 150 ml
review: Initially I thought that I have a sensitive skin so bought its strips which did not suit my skin and made it rather oily.Then I tried this normal skin cream and it went perfect.The best part is they give a sponge with it. The quantity of the cream is good and a sponge along with it is a cherry on cake.This one has a different concept, I apply this cream before showering and application is done with the soft colored side of the sponge and then after waiting for 3 minutes approximately I wash it off by scrubbing it in circular motion (in flowing water or while taking shower) by the other side of the sponge and it takes away all the hair that were ever on the skin. And

product_name: Veet In-shower Hair Removal Cream, Normal Skin - 150 ml

Always make sure NOT to use immediately any anti-persipent or perfume after using veet. All together wow experience.

review: I found it very good moisturizer. A comparison may be more helpful:-Moisturizing power:Coconut oil>Jac Olivol>Keokarpin body oil>Vaseline intensive care>Parachute deep nourish (Parachute deep nourish can moisturize mild dry skin for a day)-Stickiness:Parachute deep nourish<Vaseline intensive care<Keokarpin body oil<Jac Olivol<Coconut oil (Parachute deep care instantaneously gets absorbed in skin)-Fragrence:Parachute deep nourish>Jac Olivol>Keokarpin body oil>Coconut oil>Vaseline intensive care (Parachute deep nourish has good but intense smell, Smell of Keokarpin body oil is pleasant, personally I don't like the smell of Jac Olivol)Thickness:Vaseline intensive care (Lotion)>Parachute deep nourish(Lotion)>Coconut oil>Jac Olivol(Oil)=Keokarpin body oil-Ease of application:Parachute deep nourish>Vaseline intensive care>Keokarpin body oil=Jac Olivol>Coconut oil-Required amount:Coconut oil<Keokarpin body oil<Jac Olivol<Vaseline intensive care<Parachute deep nourish (Good amount of Parachute deep nourish is required, so it will get finished fast.)

review: I have been using parashute products since my childhood. I have always loved their products. I am in love with this product as well.  Parachute Advansed Body Lotion - DEEP NOURISH is specially crafted for extra dry skin. It provides deep nourishment. It is enriched with goodness of Coconut Milk & 100% Natural moisturizers. Its COCOLIPID TM FORMULA goes 10 layers deep to boost your natural glow.  It penetrates the skin cells and locks in moisture; thus strengthening the skin barrier from within unlike some other lotions which are only occulent.  Non-sticky fast absorbing formula with unique moisture lock technology that prevents moisture loss enriched with Coconut Milk & 100% Natural moisturizing properties, nourishes the skin making it soft and supple all day long. Helps retain skin's natural moisture. And its fragrance.  Apply the Parachute Advansed Deep Nourish Body Lotion generously all over your body after a bath or shower or before you go for a sweet night sleep and massage in circular motions, paying special attention to any dry areas.  Worth trying product. Give it a try. All the best for your purchase.ü§óü§óü§óü§óüôÇüôÇüôÇüôÇ

You can feel the difference in your skin in the morning for a long run. I would recommend you to go for if you are into night cream and not only for the girks even guys also keep it handy for a nice rejuvenated skin.

review: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream Dry to Normal Skin, 100gHi all,To all those who are wondering what it is, this is a moisturizing cream when you are in ac, hot summer . I chose so)Quantity: 100 GramsShelf life : 24 Months (2 years)PROS:‚Ä¢ Aroma is good , but little high‚Ä¢ Instantly hydrates the skin‚Ä¢ Good pack ‚Äì provided in tub model , so you can use it till the last drop.‚Ä¢ Non-greasy‚Ä¢ Contains Myramaze (South African resurrection plant)‚Ä¢ Paraben freeCONS:‚Ä¢ Cost seems a bit high‚Ä¢ We do need smaller packs to try onBy the way , I love the catchy name as well ;)I definitely recommend this productRating 4/5 *

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: The package arrived well before time, packed in a bubble wrap.The cream is really nice and smooth. I have been using this for over a month now. And I can surely say that It's not too greasy or too dry just fine. The best thing about this cream is its hydration.And this is not just for AC it can be useful for the radiations from Smartphones, PCs, and tablets which are harmful to the skin.The best kind of cream for summer.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: The most striking thing I noticed about this is its name. It's very catchy and even people around me were curious about his product. Coming to the product, this is meant for oily skin especially when you work long hours in AC and are constantly working in front of the computer/laptop. It is a lightweight fast absorbing cream. It isn't greasy or oily. It does keep my face well moisturized throughout in an AC environment. Also can be used as a good hand cream. The only con for me is the mild smell of this. It is not bad but I don't like any smell in my face products.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: Its been almost a week that i am using this moisturizer its actually working wonders to my skin.It has this coolness in it and you even feel it after long hours , which is a refreshing quality. I also have dry skin so it keeps my skin hydrated for a longer period and i dont have to worry.This also has a benefit of protecting my skin from the harmful rays emitted from electronic gadgets.I just love it.Totally recommended.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: I have tried many moisturizing creams. Some of them were not good and this one was the worst that I have ever used. I gave it some time thinking my skin will adapt to this chemically overloaded cream but in a week my skin became so flaky that I have to stop using it.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: I personally love this cream it is really good for acne prone skin and not at all oily the cons are the price is on the higher side and comes in a tub pakaging

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: Just use ut whenever you go outside. It really moisturize my skin for a long time.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: I'm a work from home mom. And recently I had an Air conditioner fixed in my home office room due to the summer heat. I spent at least good 4 to 5 hrs in my office room. I noticed that the skin on my hands and arms are dehydrated and becoming flaky. Came across this cream while browsing for heavy creams to fight dry skin on my arms and hand.ProsThis works well with oily skin. Though I  did not use it on my face. So not sure about how it would react to my facial skin. But I applied it on my arms and hands. Felt good. The aroma, uplifts your spirit and keeps your hands moisturised for a long time. I strongly recommend this for those who spent hours inside an AC room.It has a strong fragrance that lingers on for good hrs even when after you wash your hands.The cream is very light. You need to take only a tad bit and spread it on your hands or face. The good thing is its not at all greasy or oil.It comes in a beautiful container and the container is medium to big sized one.  The cream is up to the mouth of the jar, so it may not get over soon. If used judiciously, it will last for months.ConsI would not recommend this fragrance for those who are sensitive such strong and sharp fragrances.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: This is the first time I am using AC Moisturizing Cream because previously I didn't know such things exist. I was very skeptical before using this product but while I am at home I spend most of my time working in an AC Room and sometimes it has a harsh effect on my skin.So I thought why shouldn't I give it a try. After using this cream  I have noticed an immediate difference in my skin. I have oily skin and it did a pretty good job of maintaining it. The scent is strong but I don't mind it because it smells really nice.Overall Happy!PS: I really like what USTRAA does with its labels. Looks appealing. :D

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: Along with the summers comes along the constant need of air conditioning..‚òÉ.Comment with ‚ùÑ if you head to office everyday thinking "at least there is airconditioning there!!".üå£ Airconditioning has become a necessity but it also has some harmful impacts on your skin like drying it out and making it lifeless.üå´.All you need to combat that and many other issues is one little jar of magic..üåüSwitch off the AC or get this moisturizing creamüåü from Happily Unmarried!.üåøEnriched with extracts of the South African resurrection plant, this cream provides all day moisturization..üí¶Moisturizing, non-greasy and long lasting, this amazing, easily absorbable cream has a rich perfume fragrance, that can be a bit strong but diminishes quickly. üí®.‚úîDeveloped for oily skin, the variant i got leaves no residue and yet a plumped feeling..‚úîPerfect for people spending their day in the office in air conditioning!.‚úîI love the texture of this cream, it absorbs easily and leaves a plesant fragrance and moisturizing feel.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: To be honest, I bought this cream only because of the packaging but after applying It, my skin feels a lot better. Glad that I found something which is better than a popular brand's moisturizing cream that I've always used. Would buy it again!

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: Really nice moisturising cream for oily skin beauties.It's really difficult to find a moisturizer for oily skin people but finally, I found one.It has very very light fragrance which is a big thump up for me.Moisturisation power is really good which stays for good hours.It has the normal consistency of any other facial cream.Comes in a very big container.Really does it work and will recommend this.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: I have been using the AC Moisturizing Cream from Happily Unmarried, for months now and here's the review for it.DO HIT THE HELPFUL BUTTON IF MY REVIEW WAS HELPFUL.Product-The moisturizing cream comes in a cylindrical tub that holds 100 g of the cream. The tub is going to last at least 4-5 months if you apply it on the face only, and it‚Äôs really thick. The tub has a black cap and an additional washer fit in the cap.Packaging-The package arrived safe and sound, all wrapped up in a cardboard box. The individual units were heat sealed with plastic, which discards any chances of leakage (and the fear that most of us have, someone else using a bit and then sending it to us). The bottle is transparent and I always prefer it that way, as you can know how much of the moisturizing cream you have used and how much is left, before ordering for a refill.Constituent-It has a great number of oils like, shea butter, camelina sativa seed oil, canola oil, melanin, glycerine etc.Product quality-I am absolutely in love with this cream. It has everything you need for a well moisturized skin and the best part is, it blends really well. You can mix your daily foundation or lightening serum in this cream and apply it, or apply them  after applying this first. I use a matte foundation so this cream added a certain shine and glow to it. The cream is really thick, fluffy and creamy and the moisturization lasts for really long hours. At minimum its going to last for 3-4 hours. The moisturizing power of this cream is really remarkable and is great if you spent long hours in air conditioned rooms. Air conditioned rooms make our skin feel rather dry and sometimes it flakes as well. I am a library person spend at least 3-4 hours in a day, so it has really helped me, as our library is air conditioned. This cream can also be used if you don‚Äôt have AC, just dab a bit of baby powder after applying it, the powder absorbs the extra oils and the stuff required for the skin, stays in. And it‚Äôs a big tub, so its probably gonna last more than a year, as I have combination type of skin.Results-I have been using it almost regularly (except the days I am in a hurry), and I love the results, I have already recommended to a friend who has a 9-5 job and she is loving it as well.Price- The price is manageable for the cream as the tub is huge and would last for months. Also buying from amazon would be a great choice as I used a coupon they had and also there is extra discount if you subscribe for it

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: As I have said before, I have a super dry skin and it gets worse when I sleep in the AC all night (something you can't avoid in Summer). So I was looking for a heavy duty night cream that wasn't great or light, and this product caught my eyes frankly because of the name!! And it delivers on what it promises. I use it as night cream as part of my Ctm routine and don't wake up with a face that feels like Sahara desert.The cream is white in color and thick to touch but melts on the face and does not feel greasy at all. The main ingredients are shea butter, sativa oil along with chemical oil. It is not all natural ingredients product, but it does not have any harmful chemical. The smell is very mild and reminded me of vanishing cream my mom used to use when I was a kid.So a definite yes for this cream if you have very dry skin like me, and since it clearly says it is for dry skin, those with oily skin can give it a miss. For those with combination skin, this cream will help you in winter. Price wise ok because you need just a dollop for your whole face.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: A beauty cream is essential to add a bit of beauty to your face. I have used so many beauty creams till now and I have finally found the perfect cream. Happily unmarried brand AC cream is all in one beauty cream which provides numerous benefits. I have used that for a month and I am really happy as it has changed the texture of my skin and improved the skin tone. It gives an ample quantity of 100 grams in just 299 rupees.At such a low price, it offers many extraordinary benefits like regeneration of the skin and dead cells removal. And the good news is that it can be used for all the skin type from dry to normal.It has a normal consistency like other creams but it is far more moisturising. It is light weight and does not feel heavy on face. It does not make your skin look oily for a long time. It has extreme moisturising benefits. It comes with a classy and fancy package which is easy to use. Also it is very handy and can be carried around in your purse . So if you are looking for a cream which gives a beautiful glow with moisturization then this one is good to go.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: got the 'oily skin' variant and here are my observations...what i like+it moisturizes well, my skins doesn't feel oily on application rather soft and smooth. oily skin needs its moisturization too and this provides just the right amount+lightweight cream, doesn't feel heavy+gets absorbed easily+doesn't break you out (although you should be wary because of the almond oil)+protects from radiations??? idk how that's possible but the claim about protection from air-conditioning sounded reasonable so that's nicewhat i didn't like-smells high-key like shaving gel for men and the smell does stay for a while-doesn't control oil production tragically, i know it didn't claim to but at this price they probably should consider-tube packaging would've been preferred-issa water based cream so it runs off with sweat/humidity yeehaw-priceconclusions //for the price, it just doesn't seem all that worthy. there are cheaper options with nearly the same features and effects. im not buying another moisturizer for when im not sitting in an air conditioned place LOL. would try the clean and clear oil-free moisturizer instead

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: A heavy duty moisturizer for dry skin. If you have dry skin or spend multiple hours in the ac then this cream really works. It's basically a moisturizer and is something that can be used every day. It's not too greasy but on oily skin it does feel a bit heavy.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: Original rating-3.5/5Skin type while using it: Oily, always prone to acne and dehydrationI'll start with the only problem I've with this product- strong scent. Normally, my skin can get along with perfumed skin care products but it just doesn't react well to this cream. I'm guessing that's because the scent is pretty strong. It lingers on my face even after 20-25 minutes of using it.After a week of using it, I noticed small bumps forming on my forehead and jaw line area. This is why I stopped using it. Pity because it does an amazing job at moisturizing skin without leaving any greasy feel behind.The texture of this product is more of a gel-cream which makes for a light consistency. It blends easily and gets absorbed completely rather than just sitting on top of the skin. I apply it on my damp skin for better absorption. Even my makeup goes on much better with my skin adequately moisturized.If you're okay with strong fragrances in your skincare, give it a try. A little bit goes a long way to keep skin supple without that yucky oily feeling.

product_name: Happily Unmarried AC Moisturizing Cream, 100gm (Dry to Normal Skin)
review: I have combination skin that tends to become flaky in dry weather. I couldn't use cream because the product was either too heavy and oily (leading to zits) or too light (think "vanishing cream") that made my skin dry. However, I was pleasantly surprised with HU's AC cream. It was light, yet nourishing. It quickly blended it but didn't make the skin dry. I have finally found a day cream that works for me!

product_name: ST. D'VENCE Winter Edition Body Lotion with Tea Tree Oil and Shea Butter for Dry Skin
review: HI THEREI have a sensitive & a bit dry skin so very choosy in buying any beauty product.I have been using ST DVENCI winter edition moisturiser for the past several months now.I'm going to share my experience & personal  views on this product &of course that might vary from one customer to the other .BOTTLE PACKAGINGBottle looks neat & attractive with a pump.But, as many customers pointed out the last 40 ml of cream is below the pump & getting it out is nuisance & irritating.WHAT'S INSIDE THE BOTTLETea tree ,jojoba & vitamin E oill ,shea butter,  alovera are some of the main ingredients.The cream is thick, creamy and spreads real quick on the skin.No sticky / oily feel.The fragrance is extremely pleasant.WHEN TO USE?Ideally after bath when our skin is still moistIS IT EFFECTIVE?Personally for me very effective. My skin looks soft, supple & thoroughly hydrated. It nourishes my skin from deep inside.Real quality product.Many reviewers have written how this is ideal for winter & for dry skinned people.According to me this moisturiser is also extremely suitable for MATURE SKIN (above 38+) I'm 40+ & by far this is the ideal cream I have ever come across.ANY NEGATIVES?Apart from the pump that doesn't allow the last 40 mls of cream out,none.FINAL WORDThick ,fragrant cream. Easy to use.My skin simply responded very well to this product.One can feel how well it nourishes the skin with in 3 to 4 days of usage.300 ml botte lasts approximately 45 to 50 days .(moderate use)Would I recommend this if you are interested in buying? Most certainly yes! Would I buy again? Yep.In fact i have already purchased 3 bottles.REVIEW UPDATE ON 24.02.2020My fourth bottle has a pump that's lengthier than the previous ones. Now, the cream can be pumped almost fully. I would like to give full credit to the manufacturers for listening to the consumer's feedback, act & increase the length of the pump. A simple but very effective improvement. Well Done!One more thing-  this cream is no longer for very dry skin people but for dry skin. The difference is now, it doesn't give long hours of moisturizing effect like before.HOPE THIS REVIEW IS USEFUL TO YOU

review: Claimed to be completely herbal, I had very high expectations from this.‚ñ™Ô∏éSmells distinctly of alcohol; with strong, pungent, overpowering, long-lasting fragrance.‚ñ™Ô∏éSlightest shake gives rise to foam; which is unusual for toners, suggesting presence of chemicals, & disproving its claims of being an ayurvedic recipe.‚ñ™Ô∏éVery harsh on my skin. product_name: NIVEA Deodorant Roll-on, Whitening Smooth Skin, 50ml & Aloe Hydration Body Lotion, 400ml, with deep moisture serum and aloe vera for normal skin Combo
review: Okay, so you can't order a single piece but after receiving the product I was happy to get two, it's been a month I am still using this product I loved it, it smells really nice, not too strong not too light, it has kind of a nice soapy smell to it. It really is useful and odour and sweatproof but also depends on your activities. I use it regularly after taking a bath, you should apply it after taking a bath and let it dry for 5 minutes and then change into your clothes, after drying if you touch it, it gives a sticky feeling to your fingers and it leaves a white residue which I guess is the anti-presipitant thing which makes us sweatproof, it also sticks to your clothes where your under arms touch but I don't mind because it gets washed off easily and isn't really a problem, I really love this product, it is really nice and I'll definitely buy it again but if you sweat way too much and if you play sports I don't think it will be very useful to you but still you can try it. One more thing, I don't know if it whitens your underarms or not but if definitely won't blacken them, I was really afraid about it earlier but I am very happy that it doesn't blacken the underarms. It is small and cute and travel friendly. So overall, this product is really great and I'll definitely recommend buying it.

product_name: ALPHA CHOICE Night Cream for women and men, Anti aging face Cream, Wrinkle dark spot reduction blemishes removal skin whitening-50 gm
review: This item was delivered to me on February 2020 and started using it from the day one. I was using Earth Therapy night cream before (I was satisfied with its results) and from the first days itself I have observed Alpha Choice has poor results (but it cost 100 Rs more than my first night cream). Still I was patient enough to wait for a its effect on my skin. But after almost three weeks after purchase I have noticed some odd-looking grey stuff in the corner of the top layer and some change in the consistency as well. I have ignored it thinking that it can be natural and continued with the usage. But day-by-day it was growing and realised that it's a colony of bacteria or fungi and stopped using. With in that time I have developed break outs on my face as well. I have write to the seller regarding the issue through the option on amazon but they have not responded yet. SO MY DEAR FRIENDS,  KINDLY DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT AS IT HAS NO QUALITY AND IF SOME ONE GOT GOOD RESULTS ARE DUE TO THE GOOD QUALITY OF THEIR SKIN. KINDLY DON'T GO FOR IT AND WASTE YOUR MONEY AND SKIN.

product_name: WOW Anti Aging No Parabens & Mineral Oil Night Cream, 50mL
review: First of all, if you think that this or any other anti wrinkle/anti aging cream etc. Is going to get rid of your existing wrinkles then I don't think that is going to happen, no matter how much expensive the product is. These creams can only 'visibly' reduce wrinkles by keeping skin moisturized and that can delay new wrinkles development.Even Biotique wheat germ night cream could do the same at less than 200/-. Its only problem is that it is too oily and can't be used in hot weather.Now about this WOW cream, first time I got this cream from WOW directly. I have finished that cream. It was properly packed but I don't remember if it had any sealing or wrapper ouside. It lasted around 2 months. It is not greasy or sticky at all and is a bit dry so it is good for both summers and winters. I have used it in winters without any issue of any kind. It has mild fragrance which I liked. After applying it you don't feel that you have applied anything on you face. It does seem to work a little on wrinkles as long as you are using it. The so called air tight jar's dispenser works bit erratically and it does not work when around 1/3rd of the cream is left. So you have to open it to use the cream. Overall I was okay with the cream but because of the price I would give it 3 stars.Few days ago (Jan, 2019) it was on sale and I ordered 2 of these from Amazon. When I received both, boxes had scratches and jars were packed in open boxes without any kind of seal either inside or outside. Quantity seemed less but I might be wrong so I have attached few images to show what was inside when I received those.I am giving it 1 star for no sealing at all and for high MRP.You can buy it if you are getting it for around Rs 450. That is the price for which Ponds Age Miracle night cream, which I am using these days, sells for on Amazon and is similar.Update May 10th, 2019 - I oredered the cream once again. Just received it. It was manufactured in March, 2019. There is no improvement in packing at all. Open box and unsealed jar. They don't listen to customer feedback. I have attached the picture of it.

review: I have written this review after using the whole product (finished the whole bottle)What I liked about this product:-It's very smooth, doesn't leave any residue and absorbs really fast.-One bottle lasted me a month when used twice a day (2 pumps in the morning and 2 pumps before bedtime)-Easy to apply and has a nice feel to it. (Broken)-Product does not have lasting effects (Skin will be back to normal after not applying it for a week)-Could add more of the serum in the bottle rather than improving the packaging or design of the bottle.

product_name: Indus Valley Bio Organic Non-Toxic Aloe Vera Gel for Acne, Scars, Glowing & Radiant Skin Treatment-175ml
review: Winters are here and so is the season of dry skin and chapped lips.Moisturising your skin is most essential during winters to prevent ageing and uneven skin tones. It also keeps you fresh all day and increases your work capacity.Oily creams and moisturisers may be unacceptable to some and may cause breakouts in some others. I have acne problem and so I remain very careful in what I apply on my skin.While searching for a good skin care routine product, I came across this aloe gel formula from Indus Valley. I ordered it because the packaging was vintage ( I love vintagggeeee).The biggest advantages about this product:* easy to incorporate in your day to day skin care. If you have to apply the original aloe from the leaves, it will take some time to cut, wash, peel the leaves. It might not be the best idea for your busy schedule.* It is not oily at all* Made from natural product. Does not contain any chemicals or toxic substances* Has a very nice aroma.I am presenting to you some of the ways, I love to use aloe gel in my day to day routine. Hope you like it too.Aloe gel has Vitamin E which acts as an antioxidant and a natural nutrient for your skin.* Over the night moisturiser: Apply a teaspoonful of gel on your face and massage thoroughly. Leave it overnight to get a soft skin in the morning.* Morning moisturiser: After washing your face, use aloe gel to soothe your skin and before going out. This protects the delicate skin from the harsh sunrays, pollution and dry air.* Body lotion: You can use it to apply on your hands and legs in general as a good moisturiser.* Hair mask: Mix it with a little amount of curd and prepare a paste. Apply it on your hair from roots to tips. Leave it for 1 hour and then wash it usually. This conditions and strengthens your hair. Alternately you can also apply the raw aloe gel to avail the same benefits. Do this once every 2 weeks.So these are some of the ways, I like to use Aloe gel in my routine. If you guys have some novel ways, do let me know. I would love to try that.And thats the end of it! Hope you enjoyed it! product_name: Lakme Sun Expert Ultra Matte SPF 40 PA+++ Compact, 7g
review: This has been my companion for almost a year now.PROS:‚ñ™Spreads evenly, removes excess oil from skin‚ñ™Light-weight, non-sticky formulation, perfect matte finish‚ñ™Fair-medium coverage, sets makeup well‚ñ™High sun protection (SPF 40/PA+++) shields from both UVA/UVB rays‚ñ™Universal shade suits fair-medium skin tones‚ñ™Skin-friendly, suits all skin types, dermatologically tested‚ñ™Lasts for 4-5 hours, easy to reapply‚ñ™Mild pleasant fragrance‚ñ™7g quantity, 3 years expiry, affordable‚ñ™Never caused irritation, rashes or breakouts. To ensure this, I wipe off excess oil with tissue & then apply it. Never used this directly on oily skin.CONS:‚ñ™Ingredients not mentioned‚ñ™Doesn't suit dusky, dark skin tones‚ñ™Not completely waterproof/sweatproof‚ñ™Being opaque, I tend to apply a thin layer, & not sure how effective its sun proection works. Thus, I apply my regular sunscreen and follow it up with his so that suncreen provides SPF while compact removes oiliness left by sunscreen.

product_name: Indus Valley Organic Retexturing Night Cream with Mysore Sandalwood & Kokum Butter For Face and Skin (50ml)
review: This has all natural ingredients and the main attraction is Mysore sandalwood and Kokum butter..Sandalwood is known to be a very important ingredient for beautiful and glowing skin. It helps in making the skin flawless and decreases the dark spots. It also helps in making the skin bright naturally. .Kokum butter helps to moisturise the skin and give it a perfect oil balance. .It has many other ingredients like jojoba oil, almond oil, wheatgerm oil etc which have their own skin benefits.The only ingredient which I did not like is the presence of alcohol..So moving on to the benefits- üîºThick consistencyüîºAbsorbs very well into the skin üîºGood for combination to dry skin. Oily skin people should avoid. üîºIn the morning the skin feels fresh. Dry skin people have to get up with dry skin as the cold temperature draws out all the moisture. Hence it's very useful for them.Cons- üîΩPeople with oily skin should avoid. üîΩSome do not like the thick consistency of the cream üîΩ Fragrance is very mild..Need to used it atleast 1-2 months to observe results. .

product_name: Indus Valley Organic Retexturing Night Cream with Mysore Sandalwood & Kokum Butter For Face and Skin (50ml)
review: Very Hydrating, settles into skin, makes my skin plumper. It's quite heavy so use & include it in your night time skincare routine only as during the day you will sweat with it. However, it settles and mattifies. It doesn't look oily or greasy. And also it's made for night , so should be used like that. Fragrance is strong as it contains herbal products but it goes away after few seconds. It didn't irritate my sensitive acne prone skin nor it caused any breakouts. The ingredients list is clearly mentioned. The company is fair to consumers & didn't hide the ingredients list in the name of ayurveda /  herbal which is nice. The jar is plastic and comes with separator lid for hygiene purpose. I love using it.

product_name: Indus Valley Organic Retexturing Night Cream with Mysore Sandalwood & Kokum Butter For Face and Skin (50ml)

review: This is one of the best sunscreens I've ever used on me. The quality and packaging is top notch. Has a light, fluid texture that absorbs instantly. No white cast. I'm a dude, 25, and i have super sensitive skin that reacts to pretty much everything and finding the right sunscreen is incredibly hard. Thank goodness i took the plunge with this one! No irritation whatsoever and my skin looked bright and healthy at the end of the day which is amazing since most sunscreens tend to make you look dull afterwards. This has the feel of typical European sunscreens that i have used in the past like avene, la roche and vichy etc MINUS the exorbitant price! The product has a scent that is mild and not too bothersome. Seriously, go ahead. Thank me later. Or not, it's upto you.

review: This facewash is a boon to oily-normal skinned beauties! It doesn't strip the oil out of your face but it removes all the excess oil and keeps my face shine free! Usually they cost 399 but in Amazon it's only 319 and they last for a long time, I take about a quarter pump or less on my wet hands, lather it on my hands and apply it on my wet face and massage! After 30-40 secs, I wash my face with cold water when my face is oily, normal water for regular days and warm water during winters! It's just the face wash every girl must own!
